name: Optimum Complexity
desc: Data on complexity for all component companies within an index, which are then ranked so that portfolio companies can be selected with optimum complexity.
top_tickers: APPL, BAC, C, DIS, FB, GS, JPM, MSFT, TOT, TSLA
full_ticker_coverage: All tickers covered, as long as public data is available
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
why_us?: Unique proprietary dataset calculating the complexity of an Index/Company
use_cases: The algorithm is used by US Dept of Defense and our dataset used by several hedge funds
